Name: maximize_team_productivity
Description: Maximize the total story points completed by all teams per sprint

Name: maximize_sprint_velocity
Description: Maximize the average story points completed per sprint

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the severity of all blockers

Name: maximize_feature_completion
Description: Maximize the number of completed features in the product backlog

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the team satisfaction score from retrospectives

Name: minimize_project_budget_overrun
Description: Minimize the difference between actual and planned project budget

Name: maximize_stakeholder_relevance
Description: Maximize the relevance of features to stakeholders

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the percentage of sprint goals achieved

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total effort required for all tasks in a sprint

Name: maximize_worker_availability
Description: Maximize the availability of workers for project assignments

Name: maximize_epic_priority
Description: Maximize the priority of epics in the product backlog

Name: maximize_skill_level
Description: Maximize the average skill level of workers in a team

Name: maximize_user_story_completion
Description: Maximize the number of completed user stories per sprint

Name: maximize_development_snapshot_quality
Description: Maximize the test status quality of development snapshots
